section.p: Market research shows that the estimated sales for the first year will be 250.000 dollar with a grow coefficient of 1.35. The goal is to realize a sales of 5 million dollar after 10 years. Now, with this sales objective, you should determine the corresponding growth coefficient.

ol.li: Create a model in which the sales for the years t = 0 to t = 9 are calculated.
Use goal seeking to determine the grow coefficient to get a sales of 5 million in year 9.
